Product.Name: Little Pim: German Volume 4
Product.Description: Schönen Tag noch! Come along with Little Pim and friends as they spend a nice day playing with toys and exploring different rooms of their homes.

Attribute.Name: Long Description
Attribute.Values:
Schönen Tag noch! Come along with Little Pim and friends as they spend a nice day playing with toys and exploring different rooms of their homes. Meet new characters, and encounter 60 German words and phrases about household activities. (35-minute video)

Boost your German vocabulary with other Little Pim videos–also available in the LeapFrog App Center.

Product.Name: Jim and the Lost Gems
Product.Description: Jump into the action and help Jim recover the Lost Gems of an ancient Egyptian artifact! Explore 30 levels on this epic quest that travels from city to forest and temple to tomb.

Attribute.Name: Long Description
Attribute.Values: Jump into the action and help Jim recover the Lost Gems of an ancient Egyptian artifact! Explore 30 levels on this epic quest that travels from city to forest and temple to tomb. Scale skyscrapers, swing from tree branches and search a sunken shipwreck. Put your problem-solving skills to the test and collect as many gems as you can, but keep a close eye on Jim to figure out which gems to collect first. Show off your logic skills to collect all the gems in each level. Get them all and earn a triple-star rating!

Product.Name: Little Pim: Chinese Volume 5
Product.Description: Explore emotions and feelings with Little Pim and his friends. From happy to sad and emotions in between, this language video introduces 60 Mandarin Chinese words and phrases...

Attribute.Name: Long Name
Attribute.Values: Little Pim: Chinese Volume 5 - Happy, Sad, and Silly

Attribute.Name: Long Description
Attribute.Values:
Explore emotions and feelings with Little Pim and his friends. From happy to sad and emotions in between, this language video introduces 60 Mandarin Chinese words and phrases that little ones can use to describe how they feel. An award-winning foreign language series, Little Pim makes learning fun by turning everyday activities into adventures! (33-minute video)

Boost your Mandarin Chinese vocabulary with other Little Pim videos-also available in the LeapFrog App Center.

Product.Name: KIDZ BOP Christmas Party Hits
Product.Description: Celebrate the season with KIDZ BOP Christmas Party! The brand new Christmas Party Album includes such great classics as "White Christmas" and "Jingle Bell Rock". Plus kick off the New Year w...

Attribute.Name: Long Description
Attribute.Values:
Celebrate the season with KIDZ BOP Christmas Party! The brand new Christmas Party Album includes such great classics as "White Christmas" and "Jingle Bell Rock". Plus kick off the New Year with pop star party 5 bonus tracks, sung by kids for kids. (73-minute album)

Included songs:
All I Want For Christmas Is You
Blue Christmas
Caroling Caroling
Christmas Time Is Here
Christmas Wrapping
Deck The Halls
Do They Know It's Christmas (Feed The World)
Feliz Navidad
Frosty The Snowman
It's The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year
Jingle Bell Rock
Last Christmas
Rockin Around The Christmas Tree
Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer
Santa Claus Is Coming To Town
Silver Bells
The Twelve Days Of Christmas
White Christmas
Winter Wonderland
You're A Mean One, Mr. Grinch
Good Time
Let's Go
Starships
Tonight Is The Night
Don't Stop The Party

Credits
